engChrName: Whoa! It's so fast!
engSearchText: Whoa! It's so fast!
jpnChrName: わああっ……！ やっぱり速いですね……！
jpnSearchText:
わああっ……！
やっぱり速いですね……！

engChrName: And it still manages to be such a smooth ride, too.
engSearchText: And it still manages to be such a smooth ride, too.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、それなのに あんまり揺れていませんし……
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、それなのに
あんまり揺れていませんし……

engChrName: I think I can see a little of why you're so proud of it, Van.
engSearchText:
I think I can see a little of why you're so proud of
it, Van.
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんが自慢するのも 分かる気がします。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさんが自慢するのも
分かる気がします。

engChrName: I'd really start to cry if you couldn't.
engSearchText: I'd really start to cry if you couldn't.
jpnChrName: ヘッ、そうだろそうだろ。
jpnSearchText: ヘッ、そうだろそうだろ。

engChrName: We'll be outta the capital and on the northern highway in ten or so.
engSearchText:
We'll be outta the capital and on the northern
highway in ten or so.
jpnChrName: あと１０分くらいで 首都高を抜けて北の国道へ出る。
jpnSearchText:
あと１０分くらいで
首都高を抜けて北の国道へ出る。

engChrName: Then I'll show you how fast and smooth my baby can REALLY be.
engSearchText:
Then I'll show you how fast and smooth my baby can
REALLY be.
jpnChrName: そしたらコイツの速さと安定性を もう少し味わわせてやるよ。
jpnSearchText:
そしたらコイツの速さと安定性を
もう少し味わわせてやるよ。

engChrName: It can go even faster?!
engSearchText: It can go even faster?!
jpnChrName: 凄い……！ もっとスピードが出るんですねっ？
jpnSearchText:
凄い……！
もっとスピードが出るんですねっ？

engChrName: J-Just try to keep it safe, please...
engSearchText: J-Just try to keep it safe, please...
jpnChrName: あ、安全運転でお願いします……
jpnSearchText: あ、安全運転でお願いします……

engChrName: You sure know how to stay busy while on the job, don'tcha?
engSearchText:
You sure know how to stay busy while on the
job, don'tcha?
jpnChrName: ──しっかし、 なかなか盛り沢山だったな。
jpnSearchText:
──しっかし、
なかなか盛り沢山だったな。

engChrName: We ran up, down, and all around the city—and we even headed to its outskirts.
engSearchText:
We ran up, down, and all around the city—and we
even headed to its outskirts.
jpnChrName: ４ｓｐｇとやらのチェックに街巡り、 挙句の果てに郊外まで遠征かよ。
jpnSearchText:
４ｓｐｇとやらのチェックに街巡り、
挙句の果てに郊外まで遠征かよ。

engChrName: Is this what every day's gonna be like?
engSearchText: Is this what every day's gonna be like?
jpnChrName: 毎度毎度、こんな事をやってんのか？
jpnSearchText: 毎度毎度、こんな事をやってんのか？

engChrName: Nah. We usually have more free time, but we'll have busy days like this every now and then.
engSearchText:
Nah. We usually have more free time, but we'll have
busy days like this every now and then.
jpnChrName: 大抵はもう少し暇だが、 溜まるとこれくらいはザラだな。
jpnSearchText:
大抵はもう少し暇だが、
溜まるとこれくらいはザラだな。

engChrName: Why? You afraid of a little elbow grease?
engSearchText: Why? You afraid of a little elbow grease?
jpnChrName: なんだ、早くも腰が引けたかよ？
jpnSearchText: なんだ、早くも腰が引けたかよ？

engChrName: Pfft. As if.
engSearchText: Pfft. As if.
jpnChrName: ハッ、抜かしやがれ。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、抜かしやがれ。

engChrName: I'm never opposed to getting my hands dirty as long as the work's not boring—and today's jobs definitely weren't that.
engSearchText:
I'm never opposed to getting my hands dirty as long
as the work's not boring—and today's jobs definitely
weren't that.
jpnChrName: 少なくとも退屈はしなさそうだ。 やるからには精々楽しませてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
少なくとも退屈はしなさそうだ。
やるからには精々楽しませてもらうぜ。

engChrName: Good, 'cause there's plenty more where that came from.
engSearchText:
Good, 'cause there's plenty more where that
came from.
jpnChrName: 結構結構。 若いモンはそうでなくちゃな。
jpnSearchText:
結構結構。
若いモンはそうでなくちゃな。

engChrName: Heehee.
engSearchText: Heehee.
jpnChrName: ふふっ……
jpnSearchText: ふふっ……

engChrName: Oh! I almost forgot. Do you mind if we drop by the roastery in the 9th District?
engSearchText:
Oh! I almost forgot. Do you mind if we drop by the
roastery in the 9th District?
jpnChrName: あ──そうだヴァンさん。 “九区”に寄ってもいいですか？
jpnSearchText:
あ──そうだヴァンさん。
“九区”に寄ってもいいですか？

engChrName: Paulette asked if I could get some coffee beans while we were out.
engSearchText:
Paulette asked if I could get some coffee beans while
we were out.
jpnChrName: 実はポーレットさんから コーヒー豆を頼まれてまして。
jpnSearchText:
実はポーレットさんから
コーヒー豆を頼まれてまして。

engChrName: Got it. We can make a quick stop.
engSearchText: Got it. We can make a quick stop.
jpnChrName: ああ、いいぜ。 九区の焙煎所だったか。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、いいぜ。
九区の焙煎所だったか。

engChrName: Damn it, small fry. Way to make this trip longer than it needs to be.
engSearchText:
Damn it, small fry. Way to make this trip longer than
it needs to be.
jpnChrName: メンドくせぇな…… 別にいいけどよ。
jpnSearchText:
メンドくせぇな……
別にいいけどよ。

engChrName: ...Hmm?
engSearchText: ...Hmm?
jpnChrName: あん……？
jpnSearchText: あん……？

engChrName: It's raining.
engSearchText: It's raining.

engChrName: And there goes the paint job.
engSearchText: And there goes the paint job.
jpnChrName: 降ってきやがったな。
jpnSearchText: 降ってきやがったな。

engChrName: I never thought Aaron would be such a great driver.
engSearchText: I never thought Aaron would be such a great driver.
jpnChrName: ふふ、アーロンさんも 確かに慣れている感じですね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、アーロンさんも
確かに慣れている感じですね。

engChrName: His smooth driving skills are off the charts! He's really giving Van a run for his money.
engSearchText:
His smooth driving skills are off the charts!
He's really giving Van a run for his money.
jpnChrName: えへへ、揺れませんし快適です。 ヴァンさんと比べても遜色ないかと。
jpnSearchText:
えへへ、揺れませんし快適です。
ヴァンさんと比べても遜色ないかと。

engChrName: See? Told you I kick ass behind the wheel.
engSearchText: See? Told you I kick ass behind the wheel.
jpnChrName: そうだろそうだろ。
jpnSearchText: そうだろそうだろ。

engChrName: Ugh. Only thing I hate more than a smug little shit is a smug little shit with talent.
engSearchText:
Ugh. Only thing I hate more than a smug little shit is
a smug little shit with talent.
jpnChrName: ……チッ。 まあ悪くはねぇな。
jpnSearchText:
……チッ。
まあ悪くはねぇな。

engChrName: I'll admit, this isn't a bad ride. I can see why you're always raving about her.
engSearchText:
I'll admit, this isn't a bad ride. I can see why you're
always raving about her.
jpnChrName: いや、てめぇの車も言うだけあるぜ？
jpnSearchText: いや、てめぇの車も言うだけあるぜ？

engChrName: She's smooth, customizable, and comfy. I can also make sharp turns without a hitch.
engSearchText:
She's smooth, customizable, and comfy. I can also
make sharp turns without a hitch.
jpnChrName: 乗り心地は上質、拡張性も高くて パワーと小回りをギリ両立させている。
jpnSearchText:
乗り心地は上質、拡張性も高くて
パワーと小回りをギリ両立させている。

engChrName: I've always been a Red Star kind of guy, but I'm coming around to Ingert.
engSearchText:
I've always been a Red Star kind of guy, but I'm
coming around to Ingert.
jpnChrName: オレは断然、紅星（レッドスター）派だったが インゲルトもなかなか悪くねぇな。
jpnSearchText:
オレは断然、紅星（レッドスター）派だったが
インゲルトもなかなか悪くねぇな。

engChrName: Heh. I'll make a convert out of you yet. Of the four main brands, they're the best of the bun—
engSearchText:
Heh. I'll make a convert out of you yet. Of the four
main brands, they're the best of the bun—
jpnChrName: ヘッ、分かってんじゃねーか。 四大メーカーじゃ個人的には──
jpnSearchText:
ヘッ、分かってんじゃねーか。
四大メーカーじゃ個人的には──

engChrName: I think I'll take her for a spin from time to time. If I pretend she's mine, every girl in town will want a piece of me. ❤
engSearchText:
I think I'll take her for a spin from time to time. If I
pretend she's mine, every girl in town will want a
piece of me. ❤
jpnChrName: つーわけでたまに貸せや。 ナンパにも使えそうだしな❤
jpnSearchText:
つーわけでたまに貸せや。
ナンパにも使えそうだしな❤

engChrName: Burn. In. Hell.
engSearchText: Burn. In. Hell.
jpnChrName: 絶 対 に 断 る。
jpnSearchText: <S5>絶 対 に 断 る。

engChrName: Anyway, I'll let you stay on the wheel for a while.
engSearchText: Anyway, I'll let you stay on the wheel for a while.
jpnChrName: ……ま、しばらく運転は任せた。
jpnSearchText: ……ま、しばらく運転は任せた。

engChrName: If you and I keep takin' turns, we'll be at Tharbad by sunrise.
engSearchText:
If you and I keep takin' turns, we'll be at Tharbad
by sunrise.
jpnChrName: 休憩と交代を繰り返しながら進めば 朝までにはサルバッドに着くだろう。
jpnSearchText:
休憩と交代を繰り返しながら進めば
朝までにはサルバッドに着くだろう。

engChrName: Then we can meet up with Nina. Curious to find out what we signed up for.
engSearchText:
Then we can meet up with Nina. Curious to find out
what we signed up for.
jpnChrName: あのニナ・フェンリィの 依頼自体ももちろん気になるが──
jpnSearchText:
あのニナ・フェンリィの
依頼自体ももちろん気になるが──

engChrName: Me, too. It must involve the Geneses somehow, but that's about all we know for sure.
engSearchText:
Me, too. It must involve the Geneses somehow, but
that's about all we know for sure.
jpnChrName: はい──ゲネシスが光った以上、 “何か”があるのは間違いありません。
jpnSearchText:
はい──ゲネシスが光った以上、
“何か”があるのは間違いありません。

engChrName: It's times like these when I wish I could glean more insight from them when they're glowing...
engSearchText:
It's times like these when I wish I could glean more
insight from them when they're glowing...
jpnChrName: その……毎回“それが何か”まで 分からないのが申し訳ないですけど……
jpnSearchText:
その……毎回“それが何か”まで
分からないのが申し訳ないですけど……

engChrName: Hey, don't go beating yourself up.
engSearchText: Hey, don't go beating yourself up.
jpnChrName: そんな、アニエスさんが 謝ることじゃないですよっ。
jpnSearchText:
そんな、アニエスさんが
謝ることじゃないですよっ。

engChrName: I've been wondering, though. How does the glowing thing even work?
engSearchText:
I've been wondering, though. How does the glowing
thing even work?
jpnChrName: でも、本当に不思議ですよね…… どういう仕組みなんでしょう？
jpnSearchText:
でも、本当に不思議ですよね……
どういう仕組みなんでしょう？

engChrName: Goddess only knows. Those things might not be indecipherable enigmas like artifacts, but we still know next to nothing about 'em.
engSearchText:
Goddess only knows. Those things might not be
indecipherable enigmas like artifacts, but we still
know next to nothing about 'em.
jpnChrName: ああ、仕組みが解明できない 古代遺物（アーティファクト）とは違う筈だが……
jpnSearchText:
ああ、仕組みが解明できない
古代遺物（アーティファクト）とは違う筈だが……

engChrName: Maybe there's a pattern for when they light up.
engSearchText: Maybe there's a pattern for when they light up.
jpnChrName: ハン…… 俺は煌都の時しか知らねえが。
jpnSearchText:
ハン……
俺は煌都の時しか知らねえが。

engChrName: Don't they go off when Almata's pulling shit? Could they be in Tharbad?
engSearchText:
Don't they go off when Almata's pulling shit?
Could they be in Tharbad?
jpnChrName: 今までに共通しているパターン── たとえばアルマータは関係してんのか？
jpnSearchText:
今までに共通しているパターン──
たとえばアルマータは関係してんのか？

engChrName: I had my contacts look into that, but they haven't found a trace of 'em there.
engSearchText:
I had my contacts look into that, but they haven't
found a trace of 'em there.
jpnChrName: 分からん……ツテで色々調べたが 今のところそれらしい連中はいねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
分からん……ツテで色々調べたが
今のところそれらしい連中はいねぇ。

engChrName: Still, they could've been the ones who sent those threat letters out.
engSearchText:
Still, they could've been the ones who sent those
threat letters out.
jpnChrName: それこそ各方面に届いたっつう “脅迫状”がそうかもしれねえが。
jpnSearchText:
それこそ各方面に届いたっつう
“脅迫状”がそうかもしれねえが。

engChrName: Fingers crossed that isn't the case.
engSearchText: Fingers crossed that isn't the case.
jpnChrName: ニナさんの“まねーじゃー”のヒトが 届けてくれたっていう……
jpnSearchText:
ニナさんの“まねーじゃー”のヒトが
届けてくれたっていう……

engChrName: I'll bet it isn't. The approach is too soft and roundabout for them.
engSearchText:
I'll bet it isn't. The approach is too soft and
roundabout for them.
jpnChrName: ……連中（アルマータ）のやり方にしちゃあ、 ぬるいっつうか回りくどい感じだが。
jpnSearchText:
……連中（アルマータ）のやり方にしちゃあ、
ぬるいっつうか回りくどい感じだが。

engChrName: Not to mention, they don't have anything to gain by obstructing the festival.
engSearchText:
Not to mention, they don't have anything to gain by
obstructing the festival.
jpnChrName: そうですね、映画祭を 邪魔する意味も分かりませんし……
jpnSearchText:
そうですね、映画祭を
邪魔する意味も分かりませんし……

engChrName: At least, not the one in Tharbad. Maybe they had reason to stop the one in Messeldam since they're headquartered there.
engSearchText:
At least, not the one in Tharbad. Maybe they had
reason to stop the one in Messeldam since they're
headquartered there.
jpnChrName: 中止した映画祭のメッセルダムは まさに彼らの本拠地らしいですけど。
jpnSearchText:
中止した映画祭のメッセルダムは
まさに彼らの本拠地らしいですけど。

engChrName: Nah. Last I heard, they moved outta Messeldam a long time ago.
engSearchText:
Nah. Last I heard, they moved outta Messeldam a
long time ago.
jpnChrName: いや……本拠はとっくに そこから移しているらしくてな。
jpnSearchText:
いや……本拠はとっくに
そこから移しているらしくてな。

engChrName: The people responsible for stoppin' the last festival were a bunch of racial terrorists.
engSearchText:
The people responsible for stoppin' the last festival
were a bunch of racial terrorists.
jpnChrName: そっちの映画祭が狙われたのは 民族テロ関連の仕業らしい。
jpnSearchText:
そっちの映画祭が狙われたのは
民族テロ関連の仕業らしい。

engChrName: They threatened it and started a fire. Whole thing was canceled as a precaution.
engSearchText:
They threatened it and started a fire. Whole thing
was canceled as a precaution.
jpnChrName: まあ予告状とボヤくらいで 念のため大事を取っただけらしいが。
jpnSearchText:
まあ予告状とボヤくらいで
念のため大事を取っただけらしいが。

engChrName: What? For real?
engSearchText: What? For real?
jpnChrName: 民族テロ……ですか。
jpnSearchText: 民族テロ……ですか。

engChrName: And here I thought those racist bastards were a dying breed. I'd love to wipe the floor with those shitstains.
engSearchText:
And here I thought those racist bastards were a
dying breed. I'd love to wipe the floor with
those shitstains.
jpnChrName: クズだな、クズ。 一時期イキってたみてぇだが。
jpnSearchText:
クズだな、クズ。
一時期イキってたみてぇだが。

engChrName: It's so spacious in here!
engSearchText: It's so spacious in here!
jpnChrName: わあっ……！ すっごく広いですねぇ！
jpnSearchText:
わあっ……！
すっごく広いですねぇ！

engChrName: This here's an ETWS stretch limo, right? Hell of a luxury.
engSearchText:
This here's an ETWS stretch limo, right? Hell of
a luxury.
jpnChrName: エトワスのストレッチリムジンか。 まさに贅沢の極みってヤツだな。
jpnSearchText:
エトワスのストレッチリムジンか。
まさに贅沢の極みってヤツだな。

engChrName: Ride's smooth as a baby's ass, too. Still room to move up in the world, huh?
engSearchText:
Ride's smooth as a baby's ass, too. Still room to move
up in the world, huh?
jpnChrName: さっきから揺れ一つしねぇし、 上には上ってのがあるもんだよなァ？
jpnSearchText:
さっきから揺れ一つしねぇし、
上には上ってのがあるもんだよなァ？

engChrName: Hmph. The suspension systems in a luxury vehicle like this versus my pickup are built for totally different things.
engSearchText:
Hmph. The suspension systems in a luxury vehicle
like this versus my pickup are built for totally
different things.
jpnChrName: フン、ＰＵ（ピックアップ）とこの手の高級車じゃ 足回りの思想がそもそもだなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
フン、ＰＵ（ピックアップ）とこの手の高級車じゃ
足回りの思想がそもそもだなぁ……

engChrName: Haha. Speaking of, I take it you liked the part I sent you?
engSearchText:
Haha. Speaking of, I take it you liked the part I
sent you?
jpnChrName: フフ、そういえば“例のパーツ”は 気に入ってくれたかな？
jpnSearchText:
フフ、そういえば“例のパーツ”は
気に入ってくれたかな？

engChrName: I got it on special order to ensure it didn't clash with the aesthetic of your truck.
engSearchText:
I got it on special order to ensure it didn't clash with
the aesthetic of your truck.
jpnChrName: 君の愛車のデザインを損なわないよう 特注させてもらったんだが。
jpnSearchText:
君の愛車のデザインを損なわないよう
特注させてもらったんだが。

engChrName: Oh, 'like' undersells it. It's a thing of beauty.
engSearchText: Oh, 'like' undersells it. It's a thing of beauty.
jpnChrName: あー、それについては感謝してますよ。
jpnSearchText: あー、それについては感謝してますよ。

engChrName: Even if that ulterior motive behind sending it wasn't just in my head.
engSearchText:
Even if that ulterior motive behind sending it wasn't
just in my head.
jpnChrName: 微妙に透けて見えた“意図”は 気のせいじゃなかったみたいですが。
jpnSearchText:
微妙に透けて見えた“意図”は
気のせいじゃなかったみたいですが。

engChrName: Hmm? ...Still, I'm glad you're both looking well.
engSearchText: Hmm? ...Still, I'm glad you're both looking well.
jpnChrName: ？　でも殿下もナージェさんも お元気そうで本当に良かったです。
jpnSearchText:
？　でも殿下もナージェさんも
お元気そうで本当に良かったです。

engChrName: Thank you. My apologies again for all the trouble we caused you.
engSearchText:
Thank you. My apologies again for all the trouble we
caused you.
jpnChrName: ええ……その節は 本当にご迷惑をおかけしました。
jpnSearchText:
ええ……その節は
本当にご迷惑をおかけしました。

engChrName: We weren't expecting to see you all again so soon, either.
engSearchText:
We weren't expecting to see you all again so
soon, either.
jpnChrName: いや、私たちもこれほど早く 再会できるとは思っていなかった。
jpnSearchText:
いや、私たちもこれほど早く
再会できるとは思っていなかった。

engChrName: But we were already here for a visit with the president, so the timing happened to line up.
engSearchText:
But we were already here for a visit with the
president, so the timing happened to line up.
jpnChrName: ちょうど大統領へのご挨拶が 重なったのも都合が良かったかな。
jpnSearchText:
ちょうど大統領へのご挨拶が
重なったのも都合が良かったかな。

engChrName: ...What?
engSearchText: ...What?

engChrName: Oh! That Gramheart guy!
engSearchText: Oh! That Gramheart guy!
jpnChrName: あ…… “ぐらむはーと”っていう！
jpnSearchText:
あ……
“ぐらむはーと”っていう！

engChrName: Huh. Didn't see anything about a meeting on the news. Some kinda secret talks?
engSearchText:
Huh. Didn't see anything about a meeting on
the news. Some kinda secret talks?
jpnChrName: ハン……ニュースでも見なかったし いわゆる“密談”ってヤツか？
jpnSearchText:
ハン……ニュースでも見なかったし
いわゆる“密談”ってヤツか？

engChrName: You needn't concern yourself with details that are on a need-to-know basis.
engSearchText:
You needn't concern yourself with details that are on
a need-to-know basis.
jpnChrName: それについては君たちには 関係のない話だ、気にしなくていい。
jpnSearchText:
それについては君たちには
関係のない話だ、気にしなくていい。

engChrName: ...Well, we are livin' in crazy times. No doubt there's plenty for our leaders to be talkin' about.
engSearchText:
...Well, we are livin' in crazy times. No doubt there's
plenty for our leaders to be talkin' about.
jpnChrName: ……ま、このご時世だし色々あんだろう。
jpnSearchText: ……ま、このご時世だし色々あんだろう。

engChrName: Much as it bugs me that you've clearly got somethin' besides that you wanna dump on us.
engSearchText:
Much as it bugs me that you've clearly got somethin'
besides that you wanna dump on us.
jpnChrName: “別件”には遠慮なく 関わらせるつもりなのは気に食わねぇが。
jpnSearchText:
“別件”には遠慮なく
関わらせるつもりなのは気に食わねぇが。

engChrName: Oh?
engSearchText: Oh?
jpnChrName: 別件、ですか……
jpnSearchText: 別件、ですか……

engChrName: I think I see what's going on now.
engSearchText: I think I see what's going on now.
jpnChrName: ……なるほど。 何となく話が見えてきましたね。
jpnSearchText:
……なるほど。
何となく話が見えてきましたね。

engChrName: I'm sure you do. We invited you here in the hopes of hiring you.
engSearchText:
I'm sure you do. We invited you here in the hopes of
hiring you.
jpnChrName: この場を設けたのは他でもない── 君たちに新たな“依頼”をしたいんだ。
jpnSearchText:
この場を設けたのは他でもない──
君たちに新たな“依頼”をしたいんだ。

engChrName: This is a joint request from Elsaim and the CID.
engSearchText: This is a joint request from Elsaim and the CID.
jpnChrName: エルザイムとＣＩＤの共同依頼という形でね。
jpnSearchText: エルザイムとＣＩＤの共同依頼という形でね。

engChrName: That's quite the pair...
engSearchText: That's quite the pair...
jpnChrName: 共同依頼……
jpnSearchText: 共同依頼……

engChrName: I'm committing to nothing, but keep going.
engSearchText: I'm committing to nothing, but keep going.
jpnChrName: ……聞くだけは聞きましょうか。
jpnSearchText: ……聞くだけは聞きましょうか。

engChrName: The short of it is, we'd like you to go on another trip for us.
engSearchText:
The short of it is, we'd like you to go on another trip
for us.
jpnChrName: 単刀直入に言えば、 出張に行ってもらいたいのだよ。
jpnSearchText:
単刀直入に言えば、
出張に行ってもらいたいのだよ。

engChrName: To the home of the Verne Company: the city of Basel in the southwest.
engSearchText:
To the home of the Verne Company: the city of Basel
in the southwest.
jpnChrName: 共和国南西、バーゼル市── かの《ヴェルヌ社》の本拠地にね。
jpnSearchText:
共和国南西、バーゼル市──
かの《ヴェルヌ社》の本拠地にね。

engChrName: That's Calvard's biggest orbment manufacturer, isn't it?
engSearchText:
That's Calvard's biggest orbment manufacturer,
isn't it?
jpnChrName: ヴェルヌ── 共和国の巨大メーカーの……
jpnSearchText:
ヴェルヌ──
共和国の巨大メーカーの……

engChrName: This sounds like a big one.
engSearchText: This sounds like a big one.
jpnChrName: ハン……？ なかなか思わせぶりじゃねーか。
jpnSearchText:
ハン……？
なかなか思わせぶりじゃねーか。

engChrName: If you could take a look at the screen...
engSearchText: If you could take a look at the screen...
jpnChrName: こちらをご覧ください。
jpnSearchText: こちらをご覧ください。

engChrName: Basel is an industrial city that is home to both the Verne Group's HQ and the Basel Institute of Science.
engSearchText:
Basel is an industrial city that is home to both the
Verne Group's HQ and the Basel Institute
of Science.
jpnChrName: 《ヴェルヌグループ》の本拠地であり、 《バーゼル理科大学》を擁する学術工業都市──
jpnSearchText:
《ヴェルヌグループ》の本拠地であり、
《バーゼル理科大学》を擁する学術工業都市──

engChrName: Its Artisanal District dates back to the Middle Ages, and it is surrounded by an abundance of nature.
engSearchText:
Its Artisanal District dates back to the Middle Ages,
and it is surrounded by an abundance of nature.
jpnChrName: 中世の職人街もあり、美しい自然にも囲まれた この地で現在“とある異変”が起きている。
jpnSearchText:
中世の職人街もあり、美しい自然にも囲まれた
この地で現在“とある異変”が起きている。

engChrName: Our problem is that as of late, the city's orbal network has become unstable.
engSearchText:
Our problem is that as of late, the city's
orbal network has become unstable.
jpnChrName: 具体的には都市内の導力ネットと、 工業用の“導力供給網”の不安定化……
jpnSearchText:
具体的には都市内の導力ネットと、
工業用の“導力供給網”の不安定化……

engChrName: In addition, suspicious individuals have been sighted leaving and entering the city.
engSearchText:
In addition, suspicious individuals have been sighted
leaving and entering the city.
jpnChrName: さらには見慣れぬ者たちが 市内に出没しているというな。
jpnSearchText:
さらには見慣れぬ者たちが
市内に出没しているというな。

engChrName: Don't tell me it's...?
engSearchText: Don't tell me it's...?
jpnChrName: そ、それって……？
jpnSearchText: そ、それって……？

engChrName: I know what you're thinking, but we can't assume that until we have all the facts—of which, we have very little.
engSearchText:
I know what you're thinking, but we can't assume
that until we have all the facts—of which, we have
very little.
jpnChrName: まだそうと決まったわけではない── というより現時点で何も分からないんだ。
jpnSearchText:
まだそうと決まったわけではない──
というより現時点で何も分からないんだ。

engChrName: Under normal circumstances, we would be well informed of the situation, as our country has deep ties with the institute.
engSearchText:
Under normal circumstances, we would be well
informed of the situation, as our country has deep
ties with the institute.
jpnChrName: ちなみに我が国と理科大学には 昔から浅からぬ縁があるんだが……
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに我が国と理科大学には
昔から浅からぬ縁があるんだが……

engChrName: Unfortunately, its director—who also happens to be Verne's CEO—has been notably unforthcoming as of late.
engSearchText:
Unfortunately, its director—who also happens to be
Verne's CEO—has been notably unforthcoming as
of late.
jpnChrName: その理事でもあるヴェルヌ社ＣＥＯに 問い合わせても、返事が濁されていてね。
jpnSearchText:
その理事でもあるヴェルヌ社ＣＥＯに
問い合わせても、返事が濁されていてね。

engChrName: That's...strange.
engSearchText: That's...strange.
jpnChrName: それは……少々おかしいですね。
jpnSearchText: それは……少々おかしいですね。

engChrName: Isn't your country one of Verne's largest shareholders?
engSearchText: Isn't your country one of Verne's largest shareholders?
jpnChrName: たしかエルザイム公国はヴェルヌ社の 大株主であるとも聞いたような。
jpnSearchText:
たしかエルザイム公国はヴェルヌ社の
大株主であるとも聞いたような。

engChrName: Yes, it is. We are not their principal shareholder, but we still wield considerable influence over the company.
engSearchText:
Yes, it is. We are not their principal shareholder, but
we still wield considerable influence over
the company.
jpnChrName: ああ、筆頭ではないが それなりの発言力はあるはずだ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、筆頭ではないが
それなりの発言力はあるはずだ。

engChrName: Yet in spite of that fact, the CEO has been emphatically vague in response to our questions. We suspect he is merely buying time.
engSearchText:
Yet in spite of that fact, the CEO has been
emphatically vague in response to our questions.
We suspect he is merely buying time.
jpnChrName: にも関わらず、タウゼントＣＥＯは 時間稼ぎのような曖昧な返事ばかりでね。
jpnSearchText:
にも関わらず、タウゼントＣＥＯは
時間稼ぎのような曖昧な返事ばかりでね。

engChrName: For what, though, I do not know. But his sudden shift in behavior indicates he's hiding something— hence my request to you.
engSearchText:
For what, though, I do not know. But his sudden
shift in behavior indicates he's hiding something—
hence my request to you.
jpnChrName: おそらく“何か”を隠している── 君たちにはそれを見定めて欲しいんだ。
jpnSearchText:
おそらく“何か”を隠している──
君たちにはそれを見定めて欲しいんだ。

engChrName: Hmm...
engSearchText: Hmm...
jpnChrName: 何か……ですか。
jpnSearchText: 何か……ですか。

engChrName: Hmph.
engSearchText: Hmph.

engChrName: You're not givin' me much to work with here.
engSearchText: You're not givin' me much to work with here.
jpnChrName: ……随分と漠然とした話ですね。
jpnSearchText: ……随分と漠然とした話ですね。

engChrName: And if you're looking for technical experts, you've come to the wrong place.
engSearchText:
And if you're looking for technical experts, you've
come to the wrong place.
jpnChrName: 正直、技術的な問題に関しちゃ 俺たちは門外漢ですよ？
jpnSearchText:
正直、技術的な問題に関しちゃ
俺たちは門外漢ですよ？

engChrName: Oh, I beg to differ! After all, you have one of Marduk's very own concierges in your employ.
engSearchText:
Oh, I beg to differ! After all, you have one of
Marduk's very own concierges in your employ.
jpnChrName: ハッハッハ、謙遜はよしたまえ。 マルドゥック社のＳＣを雇う君が。
jpnSearchText:
ハッハッハ、謙遜はよしたまえ。
マルドゥック社のＳＣを雇う君が。

engChrName: Also, a little birdie told me you're testing some revolutionary new technology at present.
engSearchText:
Also, a little birdie told me you're testing some
revolutionary new technology at present.
jpnChrName: 何でも画期的なサービスも 運用し始めたそうじゃないか？
jpnSearchText:
何でも画期的なサービスも
運用し始めたそうじゃないか？

engChrName: Oh, you mean that simu...thingy?
engSearchText: Oh, you mean that simu...thingy?
jpnChrName: あ…… あのしみゅれーたーっていう。
jpnSearchText:
あ……
あのしみゅれーたーっていう。

engChrName: It's still undergoing testing, but we plan to reveal it to the public eventually.
engSearchText:
It's still undergoing testing, but we plan to reveal it to
the public eventually.
jpnChrName: 何分まだテスト段階なので…… いずれ一般公開もさせて頂きます。
jpnSearchText:
何分まだテスト段階なので……
いずれ一般公開もさせて頂きます。

engChrName: Good to hear. I'll most certainly be looking forward to it.
engSearchText:
Good to hear. I'll most certainly be looking forward
to it.
jpnChrName: ああ、期待させてもらうよ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、期待させてもらうよ。

engChrName: Anyhow, if we took our request to the guild, it'd land at the bottom of their list of priorities, given that no civilian casualties have occurred.
engSearchText:
Anyhow, if we took our request to the guild, it'd land
at the bottom of their list of priorities, given that no
civilian casualties have occurred.
jpnChrName: ともあれ──民間人の被害が出ていない以上、 多忙極めるギルドに頼んでも後回しだろう。
jpnSearchText:
ともあれ──民間人の被害が出ていない以上、
多忙極めるギルドに頼んでも後回しだろう。

engChrName: Also, much like the police, they're as wary as a fox with these sorts of mysteries.
engSearchText:
Also, much like the police, they're as wary as a fox
with these sorts of mysteries.
jpnChrName: それに相手の腹を探るケースでは 彼らは警察並みに敬遠されがちだからね。
jpnSearchText:
それに相手の腹を探るケースでは
彼らは警察並みに敬遠されがちだからね。

engChrName: Right. And if we're on the job, we can deal with any problems that you'd rather keep away from the public eye.
engSearchText:
Right. And if we're on the job, we can deal with any
problems that you'd rather keep away from the
public eye.
jpnChrName: その点、俺たちならいざ問題が起きても “内々”で済ませることができる──
jpnSearchText:
その点、俺たちならいざ問題が起きても
“内々”で済ませることができる──

engChrName: The conditions are fair, but you better be willing to pay top mira for our services, or you can count us out.
engSearchText:
The conditions are fair, but you better be willing to
pay top mira for our services, or you can count us out.
jpnChrName: 報酬次第、とは付け加えておきますがね。
jpnSearchText: 報酬次第、とは付け加えておきますがね。

engChrName: Oh, you needn't worry there. If anything, that makes you more trustworthy in my book.
engSearchText:
Oh, you needn't worry there. If anything, that makes
you more trustworthy in my book.
jpnChrName: ハハ、勿論。 その点はむしろ信用に値する所だよ。
jpnSearchText:
ハハ、勿論。
その点はむしろ信用に値する所だよ。

engChrName: Is that a fact?
engSearchText: Is that a fact?
jpnChrName: ハン……割り切ってやがんな。
jpnSearchText: ハン……割り切ってやがんな。

engChrName: Well, I think we should definitely consider taking this on, especially if Almata is involved.
engSearchText:
Well, I think we should definitely consider taking this
on, especially if Almata is involved.
jpnChrName: ……報酬はともかく “彼ら”の可能性については……
jpnSearchText:
……報酬はともかく
“彼ら”の可能性については……

engChrName: If possible, I'd like to ask one thing before we agree to take this on.
engSearchText:
If possible, I'd like to ask one thing before we agree to
take this on.
jpnChrName: その……恐れながら 他にも“事情”はありますよね？
jpnSearchText:
その……恐れながら
他にも“事情”はありますよね？

engChrName: What's the CID's connection to this case? You haven't been upfront about that.
engSearchText:
What's the CID's connection to this case?
You haven't been upfront about that.
jpnChrName: それだけだと、ＣＩＤとの共同であることに 説明がつかないと思うんです。
jpnSearchText:
それだけだと、ＣＩＤとの共同であることに
説明がつかないと思うんです。

jpnChrName: ほう……？
jpnSearchText: ほう……？

engChrName: Ever the sharp one.
engSearchText: Ever the sharp one.
jpnChrName: いい質問だ、お嬢さん。
jpnSearchText: いい質問だ、お嬢さん。

engChrName: Verne and the institute are currently part of two national projects.
engSearchText:
Verne and the institute are currently part of two
national projects.
jpnChrName: ──前提として、ヴェルヌ社と理科大学は 現在二つの国家プロジェクトに関わっている。
jpnSearchText:
──前提として、ヴェルヌ社と理科大学は
現在二つの国家プロジェクトに関わっている。

engChrName: One of them is for making the Xipha standard available to the general public—both at home and abroad.
engSearchText:
One of them is for making the Xipha standard
available to the general public—both at home
and abroad.
jpnChrName: 一つは君たちにも馴染みある 《ザイファ規格》の民生化と国際展開──
jpnSearchText:
一つは君たちにも馴染みある
《ザイファ規格》の民生化と国際展開──

engChrName: The technology is a national secret, so our involvement should be no surprise.
engSearchText:
The technology is a national secret, so our
involvement should be no surprise.
jpnChrName: 国防にも使われる技術であることを考えると 我々の“関与”も納得してもらえるだろう。
jpnSearchText:
国防にも使われる技術であることを考えると
我々の“関与”も納得してもらえるだろう。

engChrName: Makes sense.
engSearchText: Makes sense.
jpnChrName: ……なるほどな。
jpnSearchText: ……なるほどな。

engChrName: Gotta stay on top of any leaks and scandals so they don't slip through the cracks.
engSearchText:
Gotta stay on top of any leaks and scandals so they
don't slip through the cracks.
jpnChrName: スパイ摘発やスキャンダルの もみ消しに備えてるっつーわけか。
jpnSearchText:
スパイ摘発やスキャンダルの
もみ消しに備えてるっつーわけか。

engChrName: What about the other project?
engSearchText: What about the other project?
jpnChrName: んで、もう一つはなんだよ？
jpnSearchText: んで、もう一つはなんだよ？

engChrName: Classified.
engSearchText: Classified.
jpnChrName: ──そちらは機密事項だ。 君たちは一切気にしなくていい。
jpnSearchText:
──そちらは機密事項だ。
君たちは一切気にしなくていい。

engChrName: Ah, come on.
engSearchText: Ah, come on.
jpnChrName: ハ？
jpnSearchText: ハ？

engChrName: Boo...
engSearchText: Boo...
jpnChrName: えと……？
jpnSearchText: えと……？

engChrName: Even I don't know the specifics there, so I'm in the same boat as you all.
engSearchText:
Even I don't know the specifics there, so I'm in the
same boat as you all.
jpnChrName: 残念ながらそちらについては 私もまったく知らないくらいだ。
jpnSearchText:
残念ながらそちらについては
私もまったく知らないくらいだ。

engChrName: I did try pressing the president for details, but he simply wouldn't budge.
engSearchText:
I did try pressing the president for details, but he
simply wouldn't budge.
jpnChrName: 大統領閣下に探りを入れたら 暗に牽制されたくらいでね。
jpnSearchText:
大統領閣下に探りを入れたら
暗に牽制されたくらいでね。

engChrName: Apologies. But that's all the more reason why I cannot divulge any information about the project.
engSearchText:
Apologies. But that's all the more reason why I
cannot divulge any information about the project.
jpnChrName: 恐れ入ります──という訳で なおさら君たちが知る必要はない。
jpnSearchText:
恐れ入ります──という訳で
なおさら君たちが知る必要はない。

engChrName: The point is, there are many reasons for our involvement.
engSearchText:
The point is, there are many reasons for
our involvement.
jpnChrName: ただ単に、ＣＩＤの関与する理由が 複数あると理解してくれれば結構だ。
jpnSearchText:
ただ単に、ＣＩＤの関与する理由が
複数あると理解してくれれば結構だ。

engChrName: This all sounds fishy as hell, but whatever. Get on with it.
engSearchText:
This all sounds fishy as hell, but whatever. Get on
with it.
jpnChrName: ハン……？　胡散臭ぇが 話が進まねえから続けろや。
jpnSearchText:
ハン……？　胡散臭ぇが
話が進まねえから続けろや。

engChrName: As you wish. The issue of the Xipha standard's funding source also needs to be addressed.
engSearchText:
As you wish. The issue of the Xipha standard's
funding source also needs to be addressed.
jpnChrName: ああ──話を戻すが《ザイファ規格》には プロジェクト出資状況という事情もあってね。
jpnSearchText:
ああ──話を戻すが《ザイファ規格》には
プロジェクト出資状況という事情もあってね。

engChrName: And I will delegate that task to your group's chief and concierge.
engSearchText:
And I will delegate that task to your group's chief
and concierge.
jpnChrName: それについては、そちらの所長や ＳＣ殿に説明してもらうとしようか？
jpnSearchText:
それについては、そちらの所長や
ＳＣ殿に説明してもらうとしようか？

engChrName: Huh?
engSearchText: Huh?

engChrName: What do you mean?
engSearchText: What do you mean?
jpnChrName: と、いいますと……？
jpnSearchText: と、いいますと……？

engChrName: Since when did you become my boss? ...*sigh* Fine, I'll explain.
engSearchText:
Since when did you become my boss? ...*sigh* Fine,
I'll explain.
jpnChrName: ふう、こっちに振るんじゃねーよ。
jpnSearchText: ふう、こっちに振るんじゃねーよ。

engChrName: Xipha being Verne's sixth-generation combat orbment is common knowledge at this point.
engSearchText:
Xipha being Verne's sixth-generation combat
orbment is common knowledge at this point.
jpnChrName: ──《ザイファ規格》はヴェルヌ社が独自に 開発した第六世代として知られてるが……
jpnSearchText:
──《ザイファ規格》はヴェルヌ社が独自に
開発した第六世代として知られてるが……

engChrName: But there's a little known fact about the project's humble beginnings: it got a massive capital injection from an interested party.
engSearchText:
But there's a little known fact about the project's
humble beginnings: it got a massive capital injection
from an interested party.
jpnChrName: 立ち上げ時に、とある“出資元”が 莫大な投資をしたのがその筋じゃ有名でな。
jpnSearchText:
立ち上げ時に、とある“出資元”が
莫大な投資をしたのがその筋じゃ有名でな。

engChrName: And that party just so happens to be...
engSearchText: And that party just so happens to be...
jpnChrName: その出資元っつーのが──
jpnSearchText: その出資元っつーのが──

engChrName: ...the Valis Investment Bank.
engSearchText: ...the Valis Investment Bank.
jpnChrName: ──《ヴァリス投資銀行》。
jpnSearchText: ──《ヴァリス投資銀行》。

engChrName: Which, as it so happens, is also the largest shareholder of Marduk—my employer.
engSearchText:
Which, as it so happens, is also the largest
shareholder of Marduk—my employer.
jpnChrName: わたくしの“出向元”である マルドゥック社の筆頭株主でもありますね。
jpnSearchText:
わたくしの“出向元”である
マルドゥック社の筆頭株主でもありますね。

engChrName: I-I see...
engSearchText: I-I see...
jpnChrName: そ、そうだったんですか……

最大限に利用するつもりみたいだね？

ゲネシスの力を借りて展開しているもの……

それだけだとちょっと不安だから……

jpnSearchText:
ダメ押しに騎士さんたちの“聖痕”の力を

jpnChrName: なるほど……あれか。

彼らと手は組みませんでしたが……

engChrName: Yeah, but we just gotta suck it up.

I anticipated.

やれやれ、いずれは法国にも
我が社のノウハウを売り込みたいのだがね。

とんでもなさそうです……

people who should be here that aren't.

beck and call, and they will be ready to spring
into action...

という意味でもありますよね。

back pocket.

もしくは俺たちがしくじった場合……

and its reach'll extend beyond the capital.

jpnChrName: はは～ん、所詮は車相手に 粋がってただけだったって事かもね～！
jpnSearchText:
はは～ん、所詮は車相手に
粋がってただけだったって事かもね～！

engChrName: 'Fraid it's a little early to celebrate.
engSearchText: 'Fraid it's a little early to celebrate.
jpnChrName: ……いや、喜ぶのはまだ早え。
jpnSearchText: ……いや、喜ぶのはまだ早え。

engChrName: That thing's acceleration isn't half bad, but its top speed doesn't hold a candle to my bike's!
engSearchText:
That thing's acceleration isn't half bad, but its top
speed doesn't hold a candle to my bike's!
jpnChrName: クク、加速はまぁまぁだが…… こいつの最高速には敵わないみたいだな？
jpnSearchText:
クク、加速はまぁまぁだが……
こいつの最高速には敵わないみたいだな？

engChrName: Specs aren't the only things that matter in a race, you know.
engSearchText:
Specs aren't the only things that matter in a race,
you know.
jpnChrName: ……勝負を決めるのは スペックだけじゃないわ。
jpnSearchText:
……勝負を決めるのは
スペックだけじゃないわ。

engChrName: On that point, you and I agree!
engSearchText: On that point, you and I agree!
jpnChrName: ヒヒッ！　そうだなぁ スペックだけじゃないよなァ！？
jpnSearchText:
ヒヒッ！　そうだなぁ
スペックだけじゃないよなァ！？

engChrName: That scumbag just rammed his handlebars against hers! Talk about dangerous!
engSearchText:
That scumbag just rammed his handlebars
against hers! Talk about dangerous!
jpnChrName: 今、ハンドルバー同士をぶつけたの！？ 危なすぎでしょ……！
jpnSearchText:
今、ハンドルバー同士をぶつけたの！？
危なすぎでしょ……！

engChrName: The fact that he pulled it off without losin' his balance shows he's no amateur.
engSearchText:
The fact that he pulled it off without losin' his
balance shows he's no amateur.
jpnChrName: なるほど……それを狙ってできるのは 大した腕前だが。
jpnSearchText:
なるほど……それを狙ってできるのは
大した腕前だが。

engChrName: It's still reckless, though. These guys are freakin' crazy.
engSearchText:
It's still reckless, though. These guys are
freakin' crazy.
jpnChrName: 危険走行はバイク相手でも 変わらねえって事か。
jpnSearchText:
危険走行はバイク相手でも
変わらねえって事か。

engChrName: C'mon! I dare you to try and overtake me again!
engSearchText: C'mon! I dare you to try and overtake me again!
jpnChrName: ほらほら、抜いてみろよォ！
jpnSearchText: ほらほら、抜いてみろよォ！

engChrName: If you do, I'll hit your dingy little bike with everything I've got!
engSearchText:
If you do, I'll hit your dingy little bike with everything
I've got!
jpnChrName: ま、横に来たらまた“分からせてやる”だけだがな！ ギャハハハハッ！
jpnSearchText:
ま、横に来たらまた“分からせてやる”だけだがな！
ギャハハハハッ！

engChrName: Aww, what's the matter? Can't keep up? Or is our wimpy-ass courier getting cold feet?
engSearchText:
Aww, what's the matter? Can't keep up? Or is our
wimpy-ass courier getting cold feet?
jpnChrName: なんだ、もっと乗って来いよ！ それとも運び屋には刺激が強すぎたのかァ？
jpnSearchText:
なんだ、もっと乗って来いよ！
それとも運び屋には刺激が強すぎたのかァ？

engChrName: There's less than 500 arge until the finish line. Victory's as good as mine!
engSearchText:
There's less than 500 arge until the finish line.
Victory's as good as mine!
jpnChrName: ゴールまで５００アージュを切った―― やる気がねえならこのまま勝たせてもらうぜ！
jpnSearchText:
ゴールまで５００アージュを切った――
やる気がねえならこのまま勝たせてもらうぜ！

engChrName: (This is the decisive moment.)
engSearchText: (This is the decisive moment.)
jpnChrName: （さて、ここが勝負所ね──）
jpnSearchText: （さて、ここが勝負所ね──）

engChrName: (I can slow down, make him think I've given up, and speed past him when he least expects it—or I can rev up right now and punch it.)
engSearchText:
(I can slow down, make him think I've given up, and
speed past him when he least expects it—or I can rev
up right now and punch it.)
jpnChrName: （諦めたと見せかけて油断を誘うか、   一気に急加速して仕掛けるか──）
jpnSearchText:
（諦めたと見せかけて油断を誘うか、
一気に急加速して仕掛けるか──）

engChrName: Pfft. Throwing in the towel already?
engSearchText: Pfft. Throwing in the towel already?
jpnChrName: ハッ、もう降参ってか？
jpnSearchText: ハッ、もう降参ってか？

engChrName: What a wuss. Just stick to carrying around people's junk in the future.
engSearchText:
What a wuss. Just stick to carrying around people's
junk in the future.
jpnChrName: あー白けるわ……これに懲りたら、 大人しく荷物だけ運んでろよ。
jpnSearchText:
あー白けるわ……これに懲りたら、
大人しく荷物だけ運んでろよ。

engChrName: Haha, YES! Go courier lady!
engSearchText: Haha, YES! Go courier lady!
jpnChrName: わっ──！　すごい加速だね！？
jpnSearchText: わっ──！　すごい加速だね！？

engChrName: She caught him off guard by speeding past him at the last second!
engSearchText:
She caught him off guard by speeding past him at the
last second!
jpnChrName: 油断させてから、 進路を塞ぐ間もないくらいの超加速か……
jpnSearchText:
油断させてから、
進路を塞ぐ間もないくらいの超加速か……

engChrName: What an incredible strategy!
engSearchText: What an incredible strategy!
jpnChrName: すごすぎるぜ、エルメスさん！
jpnSearchText: すごすぎるぜ、エルメスさん！

engChrName: She even had me fooled. That was one hell of a secret weapon.
engSearchText:
She even had me fooled. That was one hell of a
secret weapon.
jpnChrName: ハハ、俺もすっかり騙されちまった。 あんな加速を隠し持ってるとはな。
jpnSearchText:
ハハ、俺もすっかり騙されちまった。
あんな加速を隠し持ってるとはな。

engChrName: If I use that...
engSearchText: If I use that...
jpnChrName: あれを使えば──
jpnSearchText: あれを使えば──

engChrName: No, I really don't want to pull that out here!
engSearchText: No, I really don't want to pull that out here!
jpnChrName: ううん、できればこのまま……！
jpnSearchText: ううん、できればこのまま……！

engChrName: Still got some fight in you, huh? Can't say I didn't see that coming!
engSearchText:
Still got some fight in you, huh? Can't say I didn't see
that coming!
jpnChrName: クハハ、最後のあがきってか！？ 読んでないと思ったかよ！
jpnSearchText:
クハハ、最後のあがきってか！？
読んでないと思ったかよ！

engChrName: You're one stubborn lady! Hahaha!
engSearchText: You're one stubborn lady! Hahaha!
jpnChrName: こいつ……！ ヒヒッ、意外としぶてえなァ……！
jpnSearchText:
こいつ……！
ヒヒッ、意外としぶてえなァ……！

engChrName: He's showing off what that ETWS bike is capable of... I don't think I can turn the tables on him!
engSearchText:
He's showing off what that ETWS bike is
capable of... I don't think I can turn the tables
on him!
jpnChrName: さっすがエトワスのハイエンド── これはちょっと押し切れないかも……！
jpnSearchText:
さっすがエトワスのハイエンド──
これはちょっと押し切れないかも……！

engChrName: They crossed the finish line at the same time!
engSearchText: They crossed the finish line at the same time!
jpnChrName: ほぼ同時……！　勝ったか！？
jpnSearchText: ほぼ同時……！　勝ったか！？

engChrName: Nah, I think he was just barely ahead of her.
engSearchText: Nah, I think he was just barely ahead of her.
jpnChrName: ……いや、わずかに相手の方が先だろう。
jpnSearchText: ……いや、わずかに相手の方が先だろう。

engChrName: Nice job.
engSearchText: Nice job.
jpnChrName: お疲れさんだったな。
jpnSearchText: お疲れさんだったな。

engChrName: Was that a turbocharger?
engSearchText: Was that a turbocharger?
jpnChrName: ありゃあターボチャージャーなのか？
jpnSearchText: ありゃあターボチャージャーなのか？

engChrName: Something along those lines. I was hoping I could win without revealing it, but them's the breaks.
engSearchText:
Something along those lines. I was hoping I could
win without revealing it, but them's the breaks.
jpnChrName: ま、似たようなものね。 見せずに終わらせたかった所だけど。
jpnSearchText:
ま、似たようなものね。
見せずに終わらせたかった所だけど。

engChrName: What happened? You looked like you were hesitating.
engSearchText:
What happened? You looked like you
were hesitating.
jpnChrName: 何かを迷っているようにも見えたが……
jpnSearchText: 何かを迷っているようにも見えたが……

engChrName: I was—and unfortunately, it cost me the race.
engSearchText: I was—and unfortunately, it cost me the race.
jpnChrName: そうね、少し判断ミスしちゃった。
jpnSearchText: そうね、少し判断ミスしちゃった。

engChrName: Well, guess I'm up next.
engSearchText: Well, guess I'm up next.
jpnChrName: 何にせよ、次は俺の番か。
jpnSearchText: 何にせよ、次は俺の番か。

engChrName: Go get 'em, Van! Knock the High Bloods off their high horses!
engSearchText:
Go get 'em, Van! Knock the High Bloods off their
high horses!
jpnChrName: ああ、ヴァンさん！ あいつらに目に物を見せてやってくれ！
jpnSearchText:
ああ、ヴァンさん！
あいつらに目に物を見せてやってくれ！

engChrName: He really did customize every part of that ETWS car, from the suspension to the spoiler.
engSearchText:
He really did customize every part of that ETWS car,
from the suspension to the spoiler.
jpnChrName: エトワスのスポーツカー…… 足回りからエアロまでフルカスタムしてやがる。
jpnSearchText:
エトワスのスポーツカー……
足回りからエアロまでフルカスタムしてやがる。

engChrName: You must be daft if you think you can take me with that little girl's car.
engSearchText:
You must be daft if you think you can take me with
that little girl's car.
jpnChrName: そんな図体（ピックアップトラック）でレースに参加するとは、 俺を愚弄しているのか？
jpnSearchText:
そんな図体（ピックアップトラック）でレースに参加するとは、
俺を愚弄しているのか？

engChrName: You've slighted me with your hubris—and I will make you pay for it!
engSearchText:
You've slighted me with your hubris—and I will make
you pay for it!
jpnChrName: 二度と舐めた口を叩けなくなるように 徹底的に教育してやろう！
jpnSearchText:
二度と舐めた口を叩けなくなるように
徹底的に教育してやろう！

engChrName: There's more cars on the road now. Usin' the turbocharger would be way too risky.
engSearchText:
There's more cars on the road now. Usin' the
turbocharger would be way too risky.
jpnChrName: ……少しずつ交通量が増えて来たな。 ターボチャージャーは危険かもしれねえ。
jpnSearchText:
……少しずつ交通量が増えて来たな。
ターボチャージャーは危険かもしれねえ。

engChrName: Bah. He swerved around those cars like it was nothing!
engSearchText:
Bah. He swerved around those cars like it
was nothing!
jpnChrName: ちっ、細かいハンドリングも中々やりやがる……！
jpnSearchText: ちっ、細かいハンドリングも中々やりやがる……！

engChrName: Thankfully, all this traffic is preventing him from hitting his top speed, so I can keep up with him.
engSearchText:
Thankfully, all this traffic is preventing him from
hitting his top speed, so I can keep up with him.
jpnChrName: 奴の本領（スピード）が発揮できない分、 離されずについていけてるが……！
jpnSearchText:
奴の本領（スピード）が発揮できない分、
離されずについていけてるが……！

engChrName: Can't get too cocky here, though. He might not be on Maxim's level, but he's still a force to be reckoned with.
engSearchText:
Can't get too cocky here, though. He might not be on
Maxim's level, but he's still a force to be
reckoned with.
jpnChrName: あのＺ１レーサーには及ばねえが、 侮ってもいられねえみたいだな。
jpnSearchText:
あのＺ１レーサーには及ばねえが、
侮ってもいられねえみたいだな。

engChrName: I had hoped he had a trick up his sleeve like that woman did. I was so looking forward to making a fool of him.
engSearchText:
I had hoped he had a trick up his sleeve like that
woman did. I was so looking forward to making a fool
of him.
jpnChrName: 先程のバイク乗りのような隠し玉があっても ねじ伏せてやるつもりだったが……
jpnSearchText:
先程のバイク乗りのような隠し玉があっても
ねじ伏せてやるつもりだったが……

engChrName: But it's clear he has nothing. What a disappointment.
engSearchText: But it's clear he has nothing. What a disappointment.
jpnChrName: フン、これでは拍子抜けだな。
jpnSearchText: フン、これでは拍子抜けだな。

engChrName: He seemed so sure of himself, too. I suppose it's up to me to put him in his place.
engSearchText:
He seemed so sure of himself, too. I suppose it's up to
me to put him in his place.
jpnChrName: レース前はやけに自信満々だったようだが……
jpnSearchText: レース前はやけに自信満々だったようだが……

engChrName: But it's clear he has nothing. What a disappointment.
engSearchText: But it's clear he has nothing. What a disappointment.
jpnChrName: フン、これでは拍子抜けだな。
jpnSearchText: フン、これでは拍子抜けだな。

engChrName: We're approachin' the point where the traffic from the Riverside District joins the expressway.
engSearchText:
We're approachin' the point where the traffic from
the Riverside District joins the expressway.
jpnChrName: 待てよ、たしかそろそろ リバーサイド方面からの合流があったな……
jpnSearchText:
待てよ、たしかそろそろ
リバーサイド方面からの合流があったな……

engChrName: At this time of day, maybe I could...
engSearchText: At this time of day, maybe I could...
jpnChrName: この時間ならもしかすると──
jpnSearchText: この時間ならもしかすると──

engChrName: Looks like he couldn't keep pace with me. How pathetic.
engSearchText:
Looks like he couldn't keep pace with me.
How pathetic.
jpnChrName: ……もう見えなくなったか。 やはり口ほどにもなかったな。
jpnSearchText:
……もう見えなくなったか。
やはり口ほどにもなかったな。

engChrName: Hmph. Someone forgot to take out yesterday's garbage.
engSearchText:
Hmph. Someone forgot to take out
yesterday's garbage.
jpnChrName: フン……仮にも勝負中だというのに、 目障りな連中が紛れ込んでいるな。
jpnSearchText:
フン……仮にも勝負中だというのに、
目障りな連中が紛れ込んでいるな。

engChrName: Why must there be so many of these infernal trucks on the expressway at night?
engSearchText:
Why must there be so many of these infernal trucks
on the expressway at night?
jpnChrName: 夜の高速は車が減る所が魅力的だが、 トラックが増えるのは頂けない。
jpnSearchText:
夜の高速は車が減る所が魅力的だが、
トラックが増えるのは頂けない。

engChrName: ...What?!
engSearchText: ...What?!
jpnChrName: っ！？　まさか！！
jpnSearchText: っ！？　まさか！！

engChrName: Hah. Your lack of knowledge of the area is comin' back to haunt you, bud!
engSearchText:
Hah. Your lack of knowledge of the area is comin'
back to haunt you, bud!
jpnChrName: ハハ、お前らの弱点は その驕りと土地勘の無さだぜ！
jpnSearchText:
ハハ、お前らの弱点は
その驕りと土地勘の無さだぜ！

engChrName: Damn. He caught up faster than I thought he would.
engSearchText: Damn. He caught up faster than I thought he would.
jpnChrName: ちっ、バレるのが早かったせいか 思ったより離せてねえ！
jpnSearchText:
ちっ、バレるのが早かったせいか
思ったより離せてねえ！

engChrName: Well, look at that! So you do have a modicum of skill after all!
engSearchText:
Well, look at that! So you do have a modicum of skill
after all!
jpnChrName: フフ、ハハハハッ！　そう来なくてはな！
jpnSearchText: フフ、ハハハハッ！　そう来なくてはな！

engChrName: Too bad it's futile. That pile of scrap can't match my car's acceleration and speed.
engSearchText:
Too bad it's futile. That pile of scrap can't match my
car's acceleration and speed.
jpnChrName: だが加速も最高速もこちらの方が上。 ──チェックメイト、だ。
jpnSearchText:
だが加速も最高速もこちらの方が上。
──チェックメイト、だ。

engChrName: I might be able to secure victory if I use my turbocharger, but it'd be risky. Should I do it?
engSearchText:
I might be able to secure victory if I use my
turbocharger, but it'd be risky. Should I do it?
jpnChrName: こうなりゃ、リスクを取って ターボチャージャーを使って引き離すか……！？
jpnSearchText:
こうなりゃ、リスクを取って
ターボチャージャーを使って引き離すか……！？

engChrName: If I wanna win this, I gotta pull out all the stops!
engSearchText: If I wanna win this, I gotta pull out all the stops!
jpnChrName: やるしかねえ！
jpnSearchText: やるしかねえ！

engChrName: Heheh. Did you really think I wouldn't have one of those, too?
engSearchText:
Heheh. Did you really think I wouldn't have one of
those, too?
jpnChrName: クク、俺がそれを持っていないとでも？
jpnSearchText: クク、俺がそれを持っていないとでも？

engChrName: Shit!
engSearchText: Shit!
jpnChrName: クソッタレが！！
jpnSearchText: クソッタレが！！

engChrName: Bah. He just had to overtake me at the last damn stretch.
engSearchText:
Bah. He just had to overtake me at the last
damn stretch.
jpnChrName: クソ……最後の最後で抜かれちまったか……
jpnSearchText: クソ……最後の最後で抜かれちまったか……

engChrName: No, I can't risk hurtin' anyone!
engSearchText: No, I can't risk hurtin' anyone!
jpnChrName: ダメだ、一般車を危険には晒せねえ！
jpnSearchText: ダメだ、一般車を危険には晒せねえ！

engChrName: I will accept no less than an overwhelming victory!
engSearchText: I will accept no less than an overwhelming victory!
jpnChrName: 俺達に必要なのは、圧倒的な勝利──！
jpnSearchText: 俺達に必要なのは、圧倒的な勝利──！

engChrName: He's got a turbocharger?! Don't use that here! It's too dangerous!
engSearchText:
He's got a turbocharger?! Don't use that here! It's
too dangerous!
jpnChrName: ターボチャージャーだと！？ バカヤロウ、危ねえぞ！
jpnSearchText:
ターボチャージャーだと！？
バカヤロウ、危ねえぞ！

engChrName: WHOA!
engSearchText: WHOA!
jpnChrName: うおおおおっ！？
jpnSearchText: うおおおおっ！？

engChrName: Tried to warn ya, dumbass.
engSearchText: Tried to warn ya, dumbass.
jpnChrName: 言わんこっちゃねえ……
jpnSearchText: 言わんこっちゃねえ……

engChrName: I thought my heart was going to jump out of my chest!
engSearchText:
I thought my heart was going to jump out of
my chest!
jpnChrName: ド、ドキドキしました…… でも無事に高速道路に乗れましたね！
jpnSearchText:
ド、ドキドキしました……
でも無事に高速道路に乗れましたね！

engChrName: I was definitely anxious for a moment, but Van's silver tongue saved the day.
engSearchText:
I was definitely anxious for a moment, but Van's
silver tongue saved the day.
jpnChrName: 一瞬、怪しまれましたけど。 さすがはヴァンさんの話術と言いますか。
jpnSearchText:
一瞬、怪しまれましたけど。
さすがはヴァンさんの話術と言いますか。

engChrName: I'm impressed he came up with that cover story on the fly.
engSearchText:
I'm impressed he came up with that cover story on
the fly.
jpnChrName: 『首都の保安活動における援助物資の配達』ってね。
jpnSearchText: 『首都の保安活動における援助物資の配達』ってね。

engChrName: You even had an ID card to back it up. I'm guessing that's not the only one you have?
engSearchText:
You even had an ID card to back it up. I'm guessing
that's not the only one you have?
jpnChrName: ちゃっかり身分証明書まで見せちゃって。 その様子だと色々持ってるのかしら？
jpnSearchText:
ちゃっかり身分証明書まで見せちゃって。
その様子だと色々持ってるのかしら？

engChrName: Yep. You can't deny they come in handy in times like these.
engSearchText:
Yep. You can't deny they come in handy in times
like these.
jpnChrName: まぁな、こういう時に役立つだろ？
jpnSearchText: まぁな、こういう時に役立つだろ？

engChrName: Hey, I'm not saying it's a bad thing. We might've been in a bind if you didn't have it.
engSearchText:
Hey, I'm not saying it's a bad thing. We might've
been in a bind if you didn't have it.
jpnChrName: 別にとやかく言う気はないわ。 おかげで第一関門は突破できたし。
jpnSearchText:
別にとやかく言う気はないわ。
おかげで第一関門は突破できたし。

engChrName: All right. Now all that's left is to get on out of the city!
engSearchText:
All right. Now all that's left is to get on out of
the city!
jpnChrName: この調子でなんとか郊外まで……！
jpnSearchText: この調子でなんとか郊外まで……！

engChrName: Wait, isn't there another checkpoint when we get off the expressway?
engSearchText:
Wait, isn't there another checkpoint when we get off
the expressway?
jpnChrName: あっ、だけど高速を降りる時にも検問があるんじゃ……
jpnSearchText: あっ、だけど高速を降りる時にも検問があるんじゃ……

engChrName: Yeah. When we get there, I think the best plan's to...
engSearchText: Yeah. When we get there, I think the best plan's to...
jpnChrName: ああ、そん時は──
jpnSearchText: ああ、そん時は──

engChrName: (No, that'd be too risky. I need to play it safe until we get out of the city.)
engSearchText:
(No, that'd be too risky. I need to play it safe until we
get out of the city.)
jpnChrName: （いや、首都を出るまでが勝負だ。   ここは慎重に行くべきだろう。）
jpnSearchText:
（いや、首都を出るまでが勝負だ。
ここは慎重に行くべきだろう。）

engChrName: Yes, that might work.
engSearchText: Yes, that might work.
jpnChrName: なるほど、それならたしかに……
jpnSearchText: なるほど、それならたしかに……

engChrName: Just try not to stay too close to the trucks, or we might cause an accident. And remember that if we're too far away, we'll be spotted for sure.
engSearchText:
Just try not to stay too close to the trucks, or we might
cause an accident. And remember that if we're too far
away, we'll be spotted for sure.
jpnChrName: 死角から外れればバレる。 トラックに近づきすぎれば事故。
jpnSearchText:
死角から外れればバレる。
トラックに近づきすぎれば事故。

engChrName: ...Wait. Isn't this plan kinda reckless?
engSearchText: ...Wait. Isn't this plan kinda reckless?
jpnChrName: ……スリリングな運転になりそうね。
jpnSearchText: ……スリリングな運転になりそうね。

engChrName: Traffic's lighter than usual. Though I guess the roads aren't usually busy this time of day.
engSearchText:
Traffic's lighter than usual. Though I guess the roads
aren't usually busy this time of day.
jpnChrName: さすがに交通量が減ってるな。 そもそも少ない時間ではあるが。
jpnSearchText:
さすがに交通量が減ってるな。
そもそも少ない時間ではあるが。

engChrName: True, but I imagine a lot of people are staying indoors due to the emergency declaration.
engSearchText:
True, but I imagine a lot of people are staying indoors
due to the emergency declaration.
jpnChrName: 非常事態宣言の影響でしょうけど…… みんな自粛してるのかもしれないわね。
jpnSearchText:
非常事態宣言の影響でしょうけど……
みんな自粛してるのかもしれないわね。

engChrName: Also, I doubt many are in the mood to go out and have fun right now.
engSearchText:
Also, I doubt many are in the mood to go out and
have fun right now.
jpnChrName: 遊びに出かける気分にもならないでしょうし。
jpnSearchText: 遊びに出かける気分にもならないでしょうし。

engChrName: Listen. Thanks for thinkin' about me, Hermès.
engSearchText: Listen. Thanks for thinkin' about me, Hermès.
jpnChrName: 気を遣わせたようで悪かった。
jpnSearchText: 気を遣わせたようで悪かった。

engChrName: But I'm fine. Really.
engSearchText: But I'm fine. Really.
jpnChrName: だが大丈夫だぜ、少なくとも俺はな。
jpnSearchText: だが大丈夫だぜ、少なくとも俺はな。

engChrName: Are you trying to convince me—or yourself?
engSearchText: Are you trying to convince me—or yourself?
jpnChrName: 本当に大丈夫な人は『大丈夫』と言わないわよ。 アークライド。
jpnSearchText:
本当に大丈夫な人は『大丈夫』と言わないわよ。
アークライド。

engChrName: I'm upset about what happened to Creil, too.
engSearchText: I'm upset about what happened to Creil, too.
jpnChrName: ……クレイユ村のことは、本当に残念だわ。
jpnSearchText: ……クレイユ村のことは、本当に残念だわ。

engChrName: The people there were always good to me whenever I dropped by for work.
engSearchText:
The people there were always good to me whenever I
dropped by for work.
jpnChrName: 仕事であっちの方に出向いた時には、 いつも良くしてもらっていた。
jpnSearchText:
仕事であっちの方に出向いた時には、
いつも良くしてもらっていた。

engChrName: Yeah. They welcomed everyone who showed up to their doorstep, even if you were an outsider or a jaeger.
engSearchText:
Yeah. They welcomed everyone who showed up to
their doorstep, even if you were an outsider or
a jaeger.
jpnChrName: 余所者だろうが猟兵だろうが受け入れる 懐の深い村だったからな。
jpnSearchText:
余所者だろうが猟兵だろうが受け入れる
懐の深い村だったからな。

engChrName: Their kindness and hospitality touched Agnès, Feri, and I when we went there a couple of months back.
engSearchText:
Their kindness and hospitality touched Agnès, Feri,
and I when we went there a couple of months back.
jpnChrName: 俺も２ヶ月前には フェリやアニエス共々世話になった。
jpnSearchText:
俺も２ヶ月前には
フェリやアニエス共々世話になった。

engChrName: I hear he stopped by there a lot, too.
engSearchText: I hear he stopped by there a lot, too.
jpnChrName: ……アイツも、 何度か行っていたそうだが……
jpnSearchText:
……アイツも、
何度か行っていたそうだが……

engChrName: You're talking about your reporter friend, right? I worked with him many times over the years.
engSearchText:
You're talking about your reporter friend, right?
I worked with him many times over the years.
jpnChrName: あの記者さんか……貴方とは別に 裏で何度か協力したこともあったわね。
jpnSearchText:
あの記者さんか……貴方とは別に
裏で何度か協力したこともあったわね。

engChrName: He was a good man. The world's a poorer place without him.
engSearchText:
He was a good man. The world's a poorer place
without him.
jpnChrName: 本当に惜しい人を亡くした……
jpnSearchText: 本当に惜しい人を亡くした……

engChrName: We should never take today for granted, because no one's guaranteed a tomorrow.
engSearchText:
We should never take today for granted, because no
one's guaranteed a tomorrow.
jpnChrName: 当たり前の明日なんてねぇ──
jpnSearchText: 当たり前の明日なんてねぇ──

engChrName: He and I both understood that, and yet...
engSearchText: He and I both understood that, and yet...
jpnChrName: 俺も、あいつも、 それは分かってたはずなんだがな……
jpnSearchText:
俺も、あいつも、
それは分かってたはずなんだがな……

engChrName: And yet you're preparing to fight the people who took him from us.
engSearchText:
And yet you're preparing to fight the people who
took him from us.
jpnChrName: それでも──貴方は動き出している。
jpnSearchText: <C1>それでも──貴方は動き出している。

engChrName: You're going to stop the mafia from stealing the futures of countless others like him.
engSearchText:
You're going to stop the mafia from stealing the
futures of countless others like him.
jpnChrName: マフィアに真に奪われつつある 当たり前の明日を掬い上げるために。
jpnSearchText:
マフィアに真に奪われつつある
当たり前の明日を掬い上げるために。

engChrName: That's the decision you've made as Van Arkride, isn't it?
engSearchText:
That's the decision you've made as Van Arkride,
isn't it?
jpnChrName: それがヴァン・アークライド、でしょう？
jpnSearchText: <C1>それがヴァン・アークライド、でしょう？

engChrName: I'm not going to ask why you came to that decision...
engSearchText: I'm not going to ask why you came to that decision...
jpnChrName: これまで貴方が何に直面してきたのか、 詳しいことを聞くつもりはない。
jpnSearchText:
これまで貴方が何に直面してきたのか、
詳しいことを聞くつもりはない。

engChrName: ...because I already know the answer.
engSearchText: ...because I already know the answer.
jpnChrName: でも、１つ分かっていることがある。
jpnSearchText: でも、１つ分かっていることがある。

engChrName: You're not the kind of person who runs from adversity—you tackle it head on.
engSearchText:
You're not the kind of person who runs from
adversity—you tackle it head on.
jpnChrName: ……貴方は、苦難に打ちのめされて 歩みを止める人じゃない。
jpnSearchText:
……貴方は、苦難に打ちのめされて
歩みを止める人じゃない。

engChrName: Never thought I'd hear somethin' like that from you of all people. Think you've got me all figured out, huh?
engSearchText:
Never thought I'd hear somethin' like that from you
of all people. Think you've got me all figured
out, huh?
jpnChrName: ……参ったな。 お前さんにそんなことを言われるとは。
jpnSearchText:
……参ったな。
お前さんにそんなことを言われるとは。

engChrName: We've known each other for a long time now. I'd like to think I've got your number at this point.
engSearchText:
We've known each other for a long time now. I'd like
to think I've got your number at this point.
jpnChrName: フフ…… それなりに長い付き合いでもあるからね。
jpnSearchText:
フフ……
それなりに長い付き合いでもあるからね。

engChrName: Heh. Guess I'm slippin', then.
engSearchText: Heh. Guess I'm slippin', then.
jpnChrName: ……ハッ、じゃあ格好つけさせてもらうか。
jpnSearchText: <C1>……ハッ、じゃあ格好つけさせてもらうか。

engChrName: I'll have to do a better job keeping up the mask. Can't have my assistants worryin' about me.
engSearchText:
I'll have to do a better job keeping up the mask.
Can't have my assistants worryin' about me.
jpnChrName: その気概で、いつも以上に アニエスたちをサポートしてやらねぇとな。
jpnSearchText:
その気概で、いつも以上に
アニエスたちをサポートしてやらねぇとな。

engChrName: I know there are sides of yourself you don't want your assistants to see. But remember this, Arkride:
engSearchText:
I know there are sides of yourself you don't want your
assistants to see. But remember this, Arkride:
jpnChrName: 仲間に見せられない顔もあるでしょう── だけど忘れないで、アークライド。
jpnSearchText:
仲間に見せられない顔もあるでしょう──
だけど忘れないで、アークライド。

engChrName: You aren't the only one who wants to help others— there are people in your life who want to extend a hand to you, too.
engSearchText:
You aren't the only one who wants to help others—
there are people in your life who want to extend a
hand to you, too.
jpnChrName: 掬い上げるのは貴方の側からだけじゃない── 貴方にも手を差し伸べる人はいるってことを。
jpnSearchText:
掬い上げるのは貴方の側からだけじゃない──
貴方にも手を差し伸べる人はいるってことを。

engChrName: Got it.
engSearchText: Got it.
jpnChrName: ……了解だ。
jpnSearchText: <C1>……了解だ。

engChrName: The rain's finally letting up. It should be a smooth ride from here.
engSearchText:
The rain's finally letting up. It should be a smooth
ride from here.
jpnChrName: 雨、止んだわね。 これなら国道も大丈夫でしょう。
jpnSearchText:
雨、止んだわね。
これなら国道も大丈夫でしょう。

engChrName: Oh? You headin' out of the city?
engSearchText: Oh? You headin' out of the city?
jpnChrName: って、この状況で首都を離れんのか？
jpnSearchText: って、この状況で首都を離れんのか？

engChrName: Yeah. I've got an urgent delivery to make, so I'm going to get it done now.
engSearchText:
Yeah. I've got an urgent delivery to make, so I'm
going to get it done now.
jpnChrName: 外せない“運び”の仕事が入っててね。 このまま向かうつもりよ。
jpnSearchText:
外せない“運び”の仕事が入っててね。
このまま向かうつもりよ。

engChrName: Need a hand? I doubt it'll be easy to get outta Edith with the emergency declaration in effect.
engSearchText:
Need a hand? I doubt it'll be easy to get outta Edith
with the emergency declaration in effect.
jpnChrName: そうか……非常事態宣言下だが大丈夫か？ 必要なら手を貸すが。
jpnSearchText:
そうか……非常事態宣言下だが大丈夫か？
必要なら手を貸すが。

engChrName: I'll be fine. They should've been told to expect me.
engSearchText: I'll be fine. They should've been told to expect me.
jpnChrName: いえ、必要ないわ。 話も通ってるはずだしね。
jpnSearchText:
いえ、必要ないわ。
話も通ってるはずだしね。

engChrName: Okay, then. You're a pro courier, so I'm sure you know what you're doin'. Safe travels.
engSearchText:
Okay, then. You're a pro courier, so I'm sure you
know what you're doin'. Safe travels.
jpnChrName: ま、プロの運び屋には要らん心配か。 せいぜい気をつけて行くといい。
jpnSearchText:
ま、プロの運び屋には要らん心配か。
せいぜい気をつけて行くといい。

engChrName: Same to you.
engSearchText: Same to you.
jpnChrName: フフ、貴方もね。
jpnSearchText: フフ、貴方もね。

engChrName: If you need help with anything, just give me a call, and I'll be over before you know it. I look forward to your continued business.
engSearchText:
If you need help with anything, just give me a call,
and I'll be over before you know it. I look forward to
your continued business.
jpnChrName: 必要ならまた駆けつけるわ。 それじゃ、今後ともご贔屓に。
jpnSearchText:
必要ならまた駆けつけるわ。
それじゃ、今後ともご贔屓に。

engChrName: And you'll have it. Peace out.
engSearchText: And you'll have it. Peace out.
jpnChrName: ああ──またな。
jpnSearchText: <C1>ああ──またな。

engChrName: Thanks, Hermès.
engSearchText: Thanks, Hermès.
jpnChrName: ……あんがとよ、エルメス。
jpnSearchText: ……あんがとよ、エルメス。

engChrName: Van then made his way back to Edith, and upon reuniting with the others, he got back to work.
engSearchText:
Van then made his way back to Edith, and upon
reuniting with the others, he got back to work.
jpnChrName: その後、ヴァンは事務所に戻り、 仲間たちと行動を再開するのだった。
jpnSearchText:
その後、ヴァンは事務所に戻り、
仲間たちと行動を再開するのだった。

engChrName: All right. Five minutes till your show starts. I think we're gonna make it in time.
engSearchText:
All right. Five minutes till your show starts. I think
we're gonna make it in time.
jpnChrName: あと５分…… ギリギリリハーサルにも間に合いそうだな。
jpnSearchText:
あと５分……
ギリギリリハーサルにも間に合いそうだな。

engChrName: Hmm? Y'all okay back there?
engSearchText: Hmm? Y'all okay back there?
jpnChrName: ？　どうした──
jpnSearchText: ？　どうした──

engChrName: Heehee...
engSearchText: Heehee...
jpnChrName: ふふっ……
jpnSearchText: ふふっ……

engChrName: Hahaha!
engSearchText: Hahaha!
jpnChrName: あははははっ……！
jpnSearchText: あははははっ……！

engChrName: I felt like I was in a car chase scene in a movie! My heart's still pounding like crazy!
engSearchText:
I felt like I was in a car chase scene in a movie!
My heart's still pounding like crazy!
jpnChrName: ドキドキした～！ あんな映画みたいな体験しちゃうなんて！
jpnSearchText:
ドキドキした～！
あんな映画みたいな体験しちゃうなんて！

engChrName: You have our thanks, Van. Had it not been for you, we would've surely been late.
engSearchText:
You have our thanks, Van. Had it not been for you,
we would've surely been late.
jpnChrName: ありがとうございます、ヴァンさん。 これでなんとか間に合いそうです。
jpnSearchText:
ありがとうございます、ヴァンさん。
これでなんとか間に合いそうです。

engChrName: We're in your debt once again.
engSearchText: We're in your debt once again.
jpnChrName: またお世話になってしまいましたね。
jpnSearchText: またお世話になってしまいましたね。

engChrName: Hey, I'm just doin' what any of your other fans would do if they were in my place.
engSearchText:
Hey, I'm just doin' what any of your other fans would
do if they were in my place.
jpnChrName: いちファンとして当然のことをしたまでさ。
jpnSearchText: いちファンとして当然のことをしたまでさ。

engChrName: Anyway, I'm impressed you could handle my crazy drivin' and laugh about it afterwards. You two are made of sterner stuff.
engSearchText:
Anyway, I'm impressed you could handle my crazy
drivin' and laugh about it afterwards. You two are
made of sterner stuff.
jpnChrName: むしろあんな運転についてきて笑ってる お前さんたちの肝が据わりすぎだろ。
jpnSearchText:
むしろあんな運転についてきて笑ってる
お前さんたちの肝が据わりすぎだろ。

engChrName: I mean, I won't deny it was a little scary.
engSearchText: I mean, I won't deny it was a little scary.
jpnChrName: あははっ、たしかにちょっとだけ 怖かったけど……
jpnSearchText:
あははっ、たしかにちょっとだけ
怖かったけど……

engChrName: But we had faith that you would keep us out of harm's way.
engSearchText:
But we had faith that you would keep us out of
harm's way.
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんを信頼してましたから。
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさんを信頼してましたから。

engChrName: We'll invite you to one of our performances in the future as thanks. I hope you'll be able to come.
engSearchText:
We'll invite you to one of our performances in the
future as thanks. I hope you'll be able to come.
jpnChrName: ……このお礼は、いつかの興行で。 今度は必ず招待させてください。
jpnSearchText:
……このお礼は、いつかの興行で。
今度は必ず招待させてください。

engChrName: Yeah! Please do!
engSearchText: Yeah! Please do!
jpnChrName: うん、絶対にね！
jpnSearchText: うん、絶対にね！

engChrName: Lookin' forward to it already. I'll ask the others if they'd like to tag along, too.
engSearchText:
Lookin' forward to it already. I'll ask the others if
they'd like to tag along, too.
jpnChrName: そりゃ楽しみだ。 フェリたちにも伝えとくぜ。
jpnSearchText:
そりゃ楽しみだ。
フェリたちにも伝えとくぜ。

engChrName: All righty. We're almost there now. Good luck, you two.
engSearchText:
All righty. We're almost there now. Good luck,
you two.
jpnChrName: もうすぐ到着だ──頑張れよ、二人とも。
jpnSearchText: もうすぐ到着だ──頑張れよ、二人とも。

engChrName: Thank you!
engSearchText: Thank you!
jpnChrName: はいっ！／うんっ！！
jpnSearchText: はいっ！／うんっ！！

engChrName: In the end, Van was able to see the two sisters safely to Trion Tower.
engSearchText:
In the end, Van was able to see the two sisters safely
to Trion Tower.
jpnChrName: その後、ヴァンは姉妹を無事に トリオンタワーまで送り届け……
jpnSearchText:
その後、ヴァンは姉妹を無事に
トリオンタワーまで送り届け……

engChrName: On his way back to the office, he listened to their performance on the radio, which seemed to be a roaring success.
engSearchText:
On his way back to the office, he listened to their
performance on the radio, which seemed to be a
roaring success.
jpnChrName: 興業の盛り上がりをラジオで聴きながら 事務所に戻り、仲間と合流したのだった。
jpnSearchText:
興業の盛り上がりをラジオで聴きながら
事務所に戻り、仲間と合流したのだった。

jpnChrName: なぁっ！？
jpnSearchText: <S5>なぁっ！？
